text: The following is a list of Corps of the Imperial German Army ==Background== ==Regular== * Guards * I * II * III * IV * V * VI * VII * VIII * IX * X * XI * XII (1st Royal Saxon) * XIII (Royal Württemberg) * XIV * XV * XVI * XVII * XVIII * XIX * XX * XXI ==Reserve== * Guards * I * III * IV * V * VI * VII * VIII * IX * X * XII * XIV * XV * XVII * XVIII * XXII * XXIII * XXIV * XXV * XXVI * XXVII * XXXVIII * XXXIX * XXXX * XXXXI ==Bavarian== * I * II * III * I Reserve * II Reserve * XV Reserve ==Cavalry== * I * II * III * IV * V * VI * Schmettow ==Genkdo z.b.V== * 51st * 52nd * 53rd * 54th * 55th * 56th * 57th * 58th * 59th * 60th * 61st * 62nd * 63rd * 64th * 65th * 66th * 67th * 68th ==Other== * Landwehr * Ersatz * Naval ==See also== *German Army (German Empire) *List of Divisions of the Imperial German Army *World War I ==References== Category:German Army (German Empire) Category:Corps
title: List of Corps of the Imperial German Army
